text: Confirmation of a registered order, whether by operation of law or after notice and hearing, precludes further contest of the order with respect to any matter that could have been asserted at the time of registration.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 30-346.8.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-301.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 608 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act). See Volume 9, Part IB Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 46-306.08

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Registration, Enforcement, and Modification of Support Order.
